name: cup_prestige
description: Win the Prestige Cup.

name: cup_national
description: Win the National Cup.

name: cup_amateur
description: Take first place in Amateur League.

name: cup_3
description: Take first place in Third League.

name: cup_2
description: Take first place in Second League.

name: cup_1
description: Take first place in First League.

name: cup_premiere
description: Take first place in Premier League.

name: nation_cups
description: Become the champion of all the leagues and win the Prestige and National Cup.

name: precise_shot
description: Use Precision Shot to score 5 goals.

name: power_shot
description: Use Power Shot to score 5 goals.

name: cannon_shot
description: Use Cannon Shot to score 5 goals.

name: rainbow_feint
description: Use Rainbow Feint to score 5 goals.

name: dribbling
description: Use Dribbling to score 5 goals.

name: layoff_pass
description: Use Layoff Pass successfully 5 times.

name: kick_forward
description: Use Nutmeg successfully 5 times.

name: tackle
description: Successfully tackle an opponent 5 times.

name: sliding_tackle
description: Use Sliding Tackle successfully 5 times.

name: savior
description: Save the goal 5 times by punching the ball to a corner.

name: maple_leaf
description: Use Olympic Kick to score 5 goals.

name: skill_3
description: Upgrade a talent or skill to level 3 for one player.

name: level_100
description: Your team needs to have at least one footballer of 100th level.

name: stadium
description: Fully upgrade the stadium.

name: hr_manager
description: Hire the best scout, assistant, or coach.

name: seller
description: Sell a player for more than one million dollars.

name: buyer
description: Buy a player for more than five million dollars.

name: goals
description: Score 5 goals during one match (Third League and higher).

name: goals_locked
description: Don't concede a single goal for 10 consecutive matches (Third League and higher).

name: goals_mf
description: Score 5 goals with a Midfielder.

name: penalty_cup
description: Win the penalty shoot-out after drawing in a Cup match.

name: penalty
description: Score a goal with a penalty.

name: free_kick
description: Score a goal with a direct free kick.

name: corner_pass
description: Score a goal after using Pass or Lofted Pass from a corner.

name: pressing
description: Tackle the ball from an opponent under pressure.

name: combinations
description: Perform 5 actions in a single turn by successfully using skills.

name: last_minute
description: Change the outcome of a game by scoring a goal on the last turn.

name: three_footballers
description: Score 3 goals during a match using three different players.

name: gk_unemployed
description: Keep the ball away from your goalkeeper the entire match (Second League and higher).

name: three_corners
description: Get three corner kicks during a single match.

name: motivation
description: Score a goal with a motivated player.

name: wins_100
description: Win 100 matches (Single campaign).

name: buyer_16
description: Buy a 16-year old footballer.

name: contracts
description: Extend the contracts of three players for three years.

name: gd_100
description: Complete a season with a goal difference of more than 50.

name: fans
description: Obtain 30,000 fans.

name: skill_3_double
description: Upgrade two talents or skills to level 3 for one footballer.

name: layoff_pass_goal
description: Score 3 goals after Layoff Pass.

name: conveyor
description: Score at least one goal in 10 consecutive matches (Third League and higher)

name: rainbow_feint_double
description: Use a Rainbow Feint successfully against a defender and then the goalkeeper (in one turn).

name: mvp
description: The same player should become a Most Valuable Player three times in a row (Third League and higher).

name: fist
description: Win a match after being behind by one or more goals (Second League and higher).

name: cup_premiere_hard
description: Take first place in Premier league playing with Hard mode.

name: cup_continental
description: Win European, American, or Asian and Oceanian Cup.

name: cup_continental2
description: Win the EFA, AFA, or AOFA Cup.

name: treble
description: Win the Premier League, the National Cup and the Continental Cup in the course of one season.

name: treble2
description: Win a treble two seasons in row.

name: treble_hard
description: Win a treble in the Hard mode.

name: total_football
description: Win a Premier League match with a team only featuring the footballers of universal classes.

name: special_football
description: Win a Premier League match with a team only featuring the footballers of special classes.

name: false_9
description: Score 5 times after distracting an opponent with a false kick in the same turn.

name: break_in
description: Score 5 times immediately after breaking in from the flank.

name: headers
description: Score with a header after a float cross 5 times.

name: d_dm
description: Develop an amateur defender into a defensive midfielder.

name: crowd_favorite
description: Develop the "Fan favourite" specialisation tree completely.

name: learning_skills
description: Develop the "Talent" specialisation tree completely.

name: experienced
description: Develop the "Dedication" specialisation tree completely.

name: utility_player
description: Develop the "Utility player" specialisation tree completely.

name: sw_move
description: Your sweepers have to change their position automatically 500 times.

name: cm_rm_lm_pressing
description: Press the same opposing player with a central midfielder and a wing midfielder simultaneously.

name: flanks
description: Run a total of 500 tiles with your wing midfielders.

name: sponsors_bonus
description: Sign a contract with a sponsor, earning a 30% bonus for having Fan Favourite players on your team.

name: dlc_revenge
description: Defeat an opponent who is a difficult opponent for you.

name: dlc_genius5
description: Win the Premier League with a team with at least 5 players with the highest giftedness.

name: dlc_champion
description: Your team's footballer should be the best footballer in the main continental tournament.

name: dlc_energy
description: Develop the "Stamina" specialisation tree completely.

name: dlc_legioner
description: Buy a football player who plays in a foreign club.

name: dlc_farewell
description: Agree to sell a footballer that another club has asked you for.

name: dlc_direct
displayName: What do I pay the Scouts for?
description: Buy a footballer directly from another club, bypassing transfers.

name: dlc_tour_team
description: Four or more of your footballers must be in the Team of the Round at the same time.

name: dlc_season_team
description: Four or more your footballers must be in the Team of the Season at the same time.

name: dlc_junior
description: Get a footballer from the Youth Academy whose main attribute is higher than any other attribute by 50 or more.

name: dlc_potential
description: Successfully complete a skill with a potential of 11 or more.

name: dlc_lottery
description: Successfully complete a level 1 skill 5 times with lesser potential than the opponent.

name: dlc_dramatic
description: Your match should be included in the statistics of the most spectacular finals of the main continental tournament.

name: dlc_ironman
description: Win the treble in Iron Manager mode on Hard difficulty.

name: dlc_record
description: Win the league with the most points in league history (Second League or higher).

name: dlc_trauma
description: Get injured for more than six months.

name: dlc_photo
description: Save a photo of the team that won any trophy.

name: dlc_raise
description: Sell a footballer by persuading the club to raise the price twice.

name: dlc_best
description: Win more Premier League gold trophies than any other team.

name: dlc_buy_genius
description: Buy the footballer with the highest giftedness.

name: dlc_grow_genius
description: Get a footballer with the highest giftedness from the youth academy.

name: dlc_sell_genius
description: Sell the footballer with the highest giftedness.

name: dlc_project_league
description: Win a league 2 or more rounds prior to the end of the championship (Third league or higher).

name: dlc_card2
description: Get disqualified for 2 yellow cards received in different matches.

name: dlc_uncomfortable
description: Meet with the team for which you have become a Bogey team.

name: dlc2_traitor
description: Start the game by accepting an offer from a country different to your nationality.

name: dlc2_voyager
description: Move to another club after successfully completing an objective.

name: dlc2_international
description: Train clubs from four different countries over one campaign.

name: dlc2_4star
description: Complete an objective set by the club management.

name: dlc2_5star
description: Get bonus Reputation Points for performing better than the objective from the club management.

name: dlc2_promotion
description: Accept an invitation from a club with the [Promote to a Higher League] objective and complete this task in Hard Mode.

name: dlc2_world_club
description: Win the Club World Cup.

name: dlc2_one_chance
description: Win the Club World Cup in Hard Mode with the Iron Manager option.

name: dlc2_exp1
description: Level up a manager to Level 2.

name: dlc2_exp2
description: Level up a manager to Level 50.

name: dlc2_yell
description: Yell at your team and score a goal with a motivated footballer in the next half.

name: dlc2_train
description: Successfully speed up skill learning for three different footballers using hard training.

name: dlc2_mood
description: Raise the mood of the club management so that it reaches maximum afterwards.

name: dlc2_youth
description: Get a footballer from the Youth Academy after you decide on youth development priorities.

name: dlc2_trauma
description: Express sincere support to an injured footballer.

name: dlc2_continent
description: Win the main continental tournament with teams from three different countries.

name: dlc2_offer
description: Move to a Premier League club from a lower league club.

name: dlc2_ability
description: Improve 5 manager abilities to the maximum.

name: dlc2_topmost
displayName: Most Important Match of the Season
description: Win the final of any cup tournament using the Most Important Match of the Season ability.

name: dlc2_crew
displayName: Old Friends are Better than New
description: Buy a footballer you managed at another club before.
